scripts.deploy:handleWebhook: source .env.gcp && gcloud functions deploy handleWebhook --gen2 --runtime=nodejs20 --region=$REGION --source=./functions/calendar-sync --entry-point=handleWebhook --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --service-account=$SERVICE_ACCOUNT_EMAIL --set-env-vars PROJECT_ID=$PROJECT_ID
scripts.deploy:renewWatches: source .env.gcp && gcloud functions deploy renewWatches --gen2 --runtime=nodejs20 --region=$REGION --source=./functions/calendar-sync --entry-point=renewWatches --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --service-account=$SERVICE_ACCOUNT_EMAIL --set-env-vars PROJECT_ID=$PROJECT_ID
scripts.deploy:api: source .env.gcp && gcloud functions deploy api --gen2 --runtime=nodejs20 --region=$REGION --source=./functions/calendar-sync --entry-point=api --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --service-account=$SERVICE_ACCOUNT_EMAIL --set-env-vars PROJECT_ID=$PROJECT_ID
scripts.deploy:functions: pnpm deploy:handleWebhook && pnpm deploy:renewWatches && pnpm deploy:api
